name: Bugging Out
description:
Learn about bug-out bags and what to collect to make your own. Use arrow keys to move around and interact with characters and objects. 

Made as a class project for English 572: Storytelling in Video Games at Minnesota State University, Mankato in June 2020. 

Story: Ehm 

Dialogue: Rachel, Ehm

Interactions: Rachel

Level Designs: Rudy, Jared, Rachel
